channel.title: Adding Home Button & Search Options Help
channel.description: Okay guys so i added the image in to background of my client can someone actually help me make it work? like when someone click in the area it says home they get redirected to a website and how i can i add it so you can type something is the search box and make it search a certain website. -here's my client's image... tried making it like runescape's
